help.entry:
SELL
Usage: sell [#] <item> sell <#>.<item>
If you'd like to sell an item to a shopkeeper, trying selling it to them. Most shops specialize in what they will buy, so you may have to look around to find a buyer for your items.
Examples:
> sell sword (sell the first sword in your inventory) > sell 3 sword (sell the first three swords in your inventory)
See also: BUY, LIST, SHOPS, VALUE
